entries.journal_entry_description: Travel to the Rryatt Trail and speak with Vritol, a Wookiee who lives on the trail.
entries.journal_entry_title: Speak with Vritol on the Rryatt Trail
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Johnson Smith, aka Brody Johnson, wants you to speak with Vritol, a creature trainer who lives on the Rryatt Trail. Vritol will give you a Kashyyyk bantha mount.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Speak with Vritol on the Rryatt Trail
